summary: The diff implements a comprehensive redesign of the website interface with a modern vibrant blue-cyan color scheme, updated typography (Space Grotesk), enhanced component styling with gradients and hover effects, and improved visual hierarchy across all pages. All four requirements (REQ-8 through REQ-11) appear to be addressed with evidence of color palette changes, typography updates, component styling enhancements, and page-specific redesigns for catalog, admin, checkout, and order confirmation.
